content: Can some linter-master please explain what https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/runs/2497904803 means?
A loop in the simp set maybe?
I fixed the lint issue by making add_valuation irreducible so that multiplicative valuation simps couldnâ€™t apply - which I should have done anyway.
It remains to be seen if this breaks any of my other files.
